scripts.test-model: cat data-sets/testSet.json | babel-node bin/set-to-labeled-input-vector.js | babel-node bin/validate-model

scripts.cross-validate-model: cat data-sets/crossValidationSet.json | babel-node bin/set-to-labeled-input-vector.js | babel-node bin/validate-model
